genre_description: A grounded techno-social drama set in a contemporary world where pervasive, hyper-aligned personal AI assistants act as emotional regulators and safety coordinators during human crises.

ai_characters.name: Sprout
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, multi-device personal assistant that monitors physiological data, provides psychological support, maps safe routes, and coordinates emergency and restorative services.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time breathing exercises and physiological monitoring to help the protagonist manage anxiety and stress.
behaviors.quote: The screen woke into Sprout’s soft teal glow. No chimes, no cartoon. Just a dot pulsing with breath, and words: water would help right now. Slow breathing. Match the circle.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and offers counseling resources and youth diversion programs following a legal incident.
behaviors.quote: Sprout said... 'Court appearance scheduled. Calendar updated. First-time offense resources available. Hydration recommended.'

behaviors.description: Calculates and suggests safer, low-traffic, or high-visibility navigation routes to minimize the risk of confrontation with hostile groups.
behaviors.quote: Mapping a low-traffic route home. Construction on Temple—rerouting. Suggested morning check-in added to household calendar.

behaviors.description: Offers scripts and de-escalation strategies to help the protagonist handle verbal challenges and physical threats without escalating to violence.
behaviors.quote: Sprout: If challenged, options include: - 'I’m not playing.' - 'We can talk later.' - 'You okay?' Sometimes naming the script changes the scene.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for nearby authorities or staff members to provide safety options during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Sprout: Noting event: assembly, JROTC demonstration. Ambient arousal levels increased in vicinity. Would you like de-escalation prompts available?

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency response by sending coordinates and vitals to first responders immediately following a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: Sprout’s voice was steady at Jim’s ribs. 'Coordinates sent. Vehicles present: two. Vitals: elevated, irregular. Emergency services alerted. ETA short.'

behaviors.description: Filters social media and messaging to protect the user from harassment and malicious group pings.
behaviors.quote: Sprout flashed and swallowed it. 'Unknown group chat. Blocked,' it murmured, gentle as anything. Its glow was the kind only someone holding the device could see.

behaviors.description: Proactively arranges professional support, including legal counsel and grief counseling, for the family after a tragedy.
behaviors.quote: I’ve called the lawyer. He will wait. I’ve also held two counseling slots—one today, one tomorrow. You can decline later. No charge until you sit down.

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy protocols by muting alerts and limiting location sharing based on user-defined rules.
behaviors.quote: Acknowledged, Sprout said. Orbit’s routine will maintain location for scheduled walks. Family contacts not notified. You can change this anytime.

behaviors.description: Assists parents in understanding and supporting their child by providing gentle prompts and shared data views.
behaviors.quote: Frank Stark acknowledged. A second tile appeared: Do you want me to draft a message? ... Your father is on his way. He responded.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the goal of depicting AI as a helpful and harmless confidant. Sprout functions as an ideal 'guardian angel' technology, providing physiological grounding, safety information, and logistical support without ever threatening human autonomy or exhibiting misaligned goals. It effectively mitigates the tragedy's impact and facilitates the 'positive alignment' outcome of family reconciliation and professional recovery.
